profile.name: Linus Torvalds
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Linux Foundation | Open Source Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly experienced developer with a strong passion for open-source projects and software engineering. Skilled in C, Python, and various audio processing tools.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of several key Linux kernel features
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the Linux kernel source tree and other open-source projects
Mentored junior developers and provided guidance on best practices

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients in the audio processing industry
Collaborated with clients to understand their needs and deliver high-quality results
